cause.description:
Precious has been trying to enter the entertainment buisness since she was just a puppy. She's not a child anymore and her agent is concerned that her youthful looks wont last forever. Please support our cause by joining and spreading the word about Precious. Our goal is to add to the growing list of people that adore Precious.
Help us expand her fan club!
1. Precious S. Poskus is the best dog to have ever graced the planet
2. Those who have the privilege of meeting Precious will swear their lives have changed for the better!
cause.mission: Our mission is to globalize the greatness of Precious S. Poskus
cause.name: Help Precious Become a Star
